entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near midnight changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 1900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1600 metres near noon. Wind west 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
